languages.text: "Только Вольный Торговец cможет транспортировать десятину и забрать всех отсюда — так что склони голову и дожидайся суда маршала в наручниках".
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."
languages.original_text: "Только Вольный Торговец cможет транспортировать десятину и забрать всех отсюда — так что склони голову и дожидайся суда маршала в наручниках".

traits.locale_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here, so bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgment in handcuffs."
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here, so bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgment in handcuffs."
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. So, bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgment in handcuffs."
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. So, bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgment in handcuffs."
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."
"Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

languages.text: «Solo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede transportar el diezmo y sacar a todo el mundo de aquí. Agachará la cabeza y esperará el dictamen del Mariscal encadenada».
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: «Solo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede transportar el diezmo y sacar a todo el mundo de aquí. Agachará la cabeza y esperará el dictamen del Mariscal encadenada».

languages.text: “只有行商浪人才有能力运送什一税，同时带领所有人离开这里。你最好赶紧低头认罪，戴上手铐，听候元帅的判决。”
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: “只有行商浪人才有能力运送什一税，同时带领所有人离开这里。你最好赶紧低头认罪，戴上手铐，听候元帅的判决。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーのみが租税を輸送することができる。全員ここから出て行け。手錠をかけて、将帥の決定が下されるまで頭を垂れて待つんだな」
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーのみが租税を輸送することができる。全員ここから出て行け。手錠をかけて、将帥の決定が下されるまで頭を垂れて待つんだな」

languages.text: « {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande} est en mesure de transporter la dîme et d'évacuer tout le monde. Vous allez ravaler votre morgue et attendre gentiment le jugement du maréchal les menottes aux poignets. »
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande} est en mesure de transporter la dîme et d'évacuer tout le monde. Vous allez ravaler votre morgue et attendre gentiment le jugement du maréchal les menottes aux poignets. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca Hür Tacir, aşarı nakledebilir ve herkesi buradan çıkarabilir. Boyun eğecek ve kelepçeli bir şekilde Miralay'ın hükmünü bekleyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca Hür Tacir, aşarı nakledebilir ve herkesi buradan çıkarabilir. Boyun eğecek ve kelepçeli bir şekilde Miralay'ın hükmünü bekleyeceksin."

languages.text: "Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann den Zehnt transportieren und alle von hier wegschaffen. Ihr werdet mit gesenktem Kopf und in Handschellen auf das Urteil des Marschalls warten.
languages.original_text: "Only the Rogue Trader can transport the tithe and get everyone out of here. You will bow your head and wait for the Marshal's judgement in handcuffs."

traits.locale_text: "Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann den Zehnt transportieren und alle von hier wegschaffen. Ihr werdet mit gesenktem Kopf und in Handschellen auf das Urteil des Marschalls warten.
